name: Ein Beispiel
description: Dies ist ein Beispielszenario, welches die unterschiedlichen Features von Hedylogos vorstellt.

nodes.name: Start Node
nodes.content: Wellcome. This is an simple audio scenario using Hedylogos showcasing the features of this software. Press ONE to learn all about automatic links. Press TWO for another menu. Or press THREE for the end.

nodes.name: About automatic links
nodes.content: Sometimes you just want a node which immediately follows the current node without waiting for some user input. This behaviour can be archived by omiting the number within a link. As you see this node has two links and both do not have a number specified. If more than one link is present one will be chosen randomly.

nodes.name: Another Menu
nodes.content: This is just another menu. Press ONE to get the current weather. Press TWO for some deep, philosophical insight.

nodes.name: The weather
nodes.content: The sun is shining and it's a beautiful day!

nodes.name: The end
nodes.content: This is the end. As the link attribute is set to null the playback of the scenario will end now.
